org.deeplearning4j.nn.api

Interface Updater

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdaDeltaUpdater, AdaGradUpdater, AdamUpdater, BaseUpdater, MultiLayerUpdater, NesterovsUpdater, NoOpUpdater, RmsPropUpdater, SgdUpdater

    public interface Updater
extends java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Update the model

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Updater clone() 
      UpdaterAggregator getAggregator(boolean addThis)
      Given this updater, get an UpdaterAggregator that can be used to combine the current state (if any) of this updater with the state of other updaters.
      void update(Layer layer, Gradient gradient, int iteration, int miniBatchSize)
      Updater: updates the model

          Gradient gradient,

        Updater: updates the model
        Parameters:
        layer -
        gradient -
        iteration -

      • getAggregator

        UpdaterAggregator getAggregator(boolean addThis)
        Given this updater, get an UpdaterAggregator that can be used to combine the current state (if any) of this updater with the state of other updaters. Typically used only in distributed learning scenarios (where each copy of the network has an updater that needs to be combined)
        Parameters:
        addThis - whether to add the Updater to the UpdaterAggregator, or just return an empy aggregator

      • clone

        Updater clone()
